text: Jaafar Jaafar is a Nigerian journalist and the founder and CEO of Daily Nigerian, an online publishing company. == Education == Jaafar holds a Master's Degree in Communication Studies from Bayero University, Kano Bachelor's Degree in Mass Communication from Bayero University Kano, and a diploma in Public Relations Strategy from London School of Public Relations. == References == Category:1978 births Category:Living people Category:Nigerian writers Category:People from Kano State
title: Jaafar Jaafar
